shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the token expires in 30 seconds.
Occurs when the token expires in 30 seconds.

section.p: To prevent this from happening, the Agora SDKs have callbacks to remind the app to renew the token both before and after the token expires. To prevent this from happening, the Agora SDKs have callbacks to remind the app to renew the token both before and after the token expires.

Upon receiving this callback, generate a new token on your server, and call to pass the new token to the SDK. Upon receiving this callback, generate a new token on your server, and call to pass the new token to the SDK.

plentry.pd: The token that expires in 30 seconds. The token that expires in 30 seconds.
